headline: My 5 Top Stocks to Buy Right Now in This Highly Volatile Market
summary: The major market indexes are behaving like a frantic yo-yo, swinging up or down depending on the latest tariff- or Fed-related news from the White House.  You can still find attractive stocks despite all of the turbulence.  Here are my five top stocks to buy right now in this highly volatile market.
